sentences.sContent: I will cover these transitions in the next installment.

sentences.sCn: 我将在接下来的部分中讨论这些转移。

sentences.sContent: We will also discuss this in more detail in an upcoming installment.

sentences.sContent: In this installment of Mission:Messaging, I will walk you through the tasks to configure basic SSL channels with self-signed certificates, building two scripts as we go.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this installment of Mission:Messaging, I will walk you through the tasks to configure basic SSL channels with self-signed certificates, building two scripts as we go.
sentences.sCn: 在《任务：消息传递》系列的这个部分，我将和您一起完成使用自签名证书配置基本 SSL 通道的任务，我们将构建两个脚本。
